name: AssemblyVersioning
description: Automatically increment you assembly versions to easily identify the version of your product.
author: Ricardo Serradas
helpMarkDown: This build task helps you version your assemblies, rewriting your AssemblyInfo files. To use it, please keep the default Build Number Format.

inputs.name: RootDir
inputs.label: The root working directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Define from which directory should this task search for AssemblyInfo files

inputs.name: FileNamePattern
inputs.label: AssemblyInfo file name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name the AssemblyInfo files this task should search for

inputs.name: Major
inputs.label: Major number
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Major version of your Software. Should change only if it breaks compatibility with previous versions.

inputs.name: Minor
inputs.label: Minor number
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Minor identifier. Increment it if this build will deliver new features.
